'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.5]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-03-13 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2024-04-02 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons {{Wish Item|Uraku Misugiri;Redhorn Stonethresher}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons The {{Wish Item|The Alley Flash;Alley Hunter}} as well as the 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|The Bell;Dragon's Bane;Favonius Codex}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event wish, use [[Epitomized Path]] to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as {{Wish Item|Uraku Misugiri}} or {{Wish Item|Redhorn Stonethresher}}. For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
